attributes.action: Bring the Plaques on the Memorial Wall in Basra back to Great Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to bring the Basra Memorial Plaques back to Great Britain, preferably Alrewas Memorial Aboretum,Staffordshire.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Bring the Plaques on the Memorial Wall in Basra back to Great Britain."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20386


Prime Minister's Office
